name: Join Me Dude!
description:
"Join Me Dude!" is our game for the GMTK Gamejam 2021.

Objective:

You have to help plant a lot of dandelion flowers on a small planet. Collect as many dandelion seeds as possible while falling down and then land on a fertile spot (not in the water or on a stone).
The more seeds you plant, the more new flowers will grow and help you to fill the entire planet with more dandeilions on your next attempt. When a big part of the planet is filled, you win the level.

We thought about adding enemies messing around with you (ladybugs, frogs, Spiders and webs), different windsettings and gust of wind, different planets, flying formations to of your seeds, a lot of cute animations... But all of that is a bit to much for short time of this gamejam :)

Controls:

  • WASD - Steer in any direction while falling
  • Shift - Hold to fall quicker
  • Space - Blow the dandelion and start the game

Team:

Elias - 3D

Feifei - 2D

Jonathan - Programming

Marcel - 2D

Used Assets (most was created by ourselfes, but this are some assets we hadn't the tme to create):

- Grass model textures: https://ambientcg.com/view?id=Foliage001

- Terraingrass Texture: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/terrain-textures-pack-free-139542

- Water Shader: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/urp-stylized-water-shader-proto-series-187485

- Some plant textures: https://opengameart.org/content/paramecijs-vegetation-base-texture-pack

- Music: https://freesound.org/people/DDmyzik/sounds/555800/

- Skybox: https://hdrihaven.com/hdri/?h=lilienstein
